column4: I have a question. I had a dual boot vista/ubuntu installation that i wanted to ditch vista from. I backed up my ubuntu via partimage, reformatted the drive, and restored it via partimage, and now grub wont load properly. I've tried editing the menu.lst, but with the uuid lines i'm not really sure what to do. Any ideas?
the uuids have to match for the root partition indicated in menu.lst, and also in /etc/fstab if you used them there...
if you reformatted and created new partitions, the uuids should change. So I'm suspicious of the root uuid not needing to be updated. Especially if it's still not working...
